document.full_text: an 18-year-old indiana man was sentenced to 100 years in prison for the murder and rape of a 14-year-old girl, prosecutors said on tuesday.
document.title: indiana youth sentenced to 100 years for murdering 14-year-old
lines_and_colors: an 18-year-old indiana man was sentenced to 100 years in prison for the murder and rape of a 14-year-old girl, prosecutors said on tuesday.
